tutorials.Title: Using the Tip Menu
tutorials.Subtitle: 1sdsdf001
tutorials.Description:
• Open the Main Menu by tapping the + sign and then tap the Tips icon in the lower left.
• Swipe up and down to move around the list
• Tap a row to see details.
• When viewing a tip detail swipe left and right to see the other tips in the section.
tutorials.Tip: The red highlight shows your current section

tutorials.Title: Opening & closing the menu
tutorials.Subtitle: 1sdsdf001
tutorials.Description:
• Tap the red circle with the + sign to open the Main Menu.
• Tap a subtitle to load a new section.
• Tap the X or anywhere outside of the Main Menu to close.
tutorials.Tip: The red highlight shows your current section

tutorials.Title: Reset the app
tutorials.Subtitle: 1sdsdf001
tutorials.Description: • Open the Main Menu by tapping the + sign and then tap the 'arrows' icon in the bottom right.

tutorials.Title: Rotating the View
tutorials.Description:
Drag left and right to spin the view.
• Pinch and zoom with two fingers.
tutorials.Tip: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

tutorials.Title: Exploring the Buildings
tutorials.Description:
Tap a building to jump into a detailed view with additional data.
• Swipe to load the next building or tap the arrows in the toolbox.
• Tap the three lines in the corner to jump to another building quickly.
• Tap the grid to open the gallery.
tutorials.Tip: Duis nec elit mattis, placerat nunc eu, fringilla arcu.
